sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app id="inspire">
      <v-content>
        <v-container fluid fill-height>
          <v-layout align-center justify-center>
            <v-flex xs12 sm8 md4>
              <v-card class="elevation-12">
                <v-toolbar color="black" dark>
                <v-toolbar-title>Register</v-toolbar-title>
                </v-toolbar>
                <v-card-text>
                  <v-form>
                    <v-text-field
                      name="username"
                      label="Username"
                      type="text"
                      v-model="username"
                      placeholder="username"
                      @keyup.enter.prevent="addItem"
                    ></v-text-field>
                    <v-text-field
                      name="email"
                      label="Email"
                      type="email"
                      v-model="email"
                      placeholder="example@email.com"
                    ></v-text-field>
                    <v-text-field
                      id="password"
                      name="password"
                      label="Password"
                      type="password"
                      v-model="password"
                      placeholder="password"
                    ></v-text-field>
                  </v-form>
                </v-card-text>
                <v-card-actions>
                  <v-spacer></v-spacer>
                  <v-btn color="black" dark @click.prevent="addItem">Register</v-btn>
                </v-card-actions>
              </v-card>
            </v-flex>
          </v-layout>
        </v-container>
      </v-content>
  </v-app>
</template>
<script>
import { db } from "../firebase/db";

export default {
  name: "Register",
    data() {
      return {
        Account:[],
        username: "",
        email: "",
        password: "",
      };
    },
  methods: {
    
      async addItem() {
        // console.log({ username: this.username,email: this.email,password: this.password });
      if (this.username) {
        await db.collection("Account").add({ username: this.username,email: this.email,password: this.password });
        this.username = "";
        this.email = "";
        this.password = "";
      }
    }
  },
  firestore: {
    Account: db.collection("Account")
  }
};
</script>
